description: Main Flutter application file for Tic Tac Toe game, defining app entry point, main UI structure, and state management for the game.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Tic Tac Toe Flutter application, sets up MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

classes.name: GameScreen
classes.description: Main game screen hosting the game board, status bar, and control buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp, returning MaterialApp with theme and home page.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for GameScreen.

methods.name: _GameScreenState
methods.description: State class managing the Tic Tac Toe game logic, user interactions, and UI updates.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the game instance when the widget state is created.

methods.name: _handleCellTap
methods.description: Handles user tap on a cell, updates the game state if the move is valid.

methods.name: _resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the game screen, including status bar, board, and controls.
